price: Ga waɗanda suke yin rantsuwa* daga matansu akwai jinkirin watã huɗu. To, idan sun kõma, to, lalle ne Allah Mai gãfara ne, Mai jin ƙai.
arabic: لِّلَّذِينَ يُؤۡلُونَ مِن نِّسَآئِهِمۡ تَرَبُّصُ أَرۡبَعَةِ أَشۡهُرٖۖ فَإِن فَآءُو فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
footnotes: * Hukuncin ĩlã'i, watau rantsuwa a kan barin tãkin matarsa dõmin ya wahalar da ita, a jira shi wata hudu, idan yã ƙi kõmãwa a sake ta daga gare shi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lilladhīna yu'lūna min nisāihim tarabbuṣu arbaʿati ashhurin fa-in fāū fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
